roleset.name: having flaws, perhaps in suitability to something

example.name: arg1
example.text: That 's the truth . Do we need to debate whether our system is good or not ? Or do we need to argue that our reforms are merely " imperfect " ?

roleset.note: IMPERFECT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'perfect.01'. (from imperfect.01-j)
